article_title: Norman's first Farm Girl Fair giving folks a taste of the country life

article_metadata.author: Sarah Kirby Transcript Staff Writer

og.description: Carol Bauman is an unlikely farm girl. The Norman resident lived “in the city” all her life, but now her address is a bona fide farm, along with her husband
